p: Nine studies tested the antimicrobial activity for Campylobacter spp. through the MIC [ 23, 24, 26, 29– 31, 33– 35], while five studies tested only through disk diffusion method [ 25, 27, 28, 32, 36]. Table 1 provides a summary of the studied plant extracts, plant parts, isolated compounds, diameter of inhibition, MIC, and MBC of the tested plants.
